title: Grand Valley State University
description: Collaborated with faculty and staff to understand their technology needs and provide appropriate solutions and support. Provided technical support to faculty, staff, and students in troubleshooting and resolving technology-related issues.

title: Thien Khoi Real Estate Company
description: Optimized database performance to ensure the smooth operation of real estate systems that serve 10,000+ users. Wrote SQL to generate daily and monthly requested reports; implemented procedures to meet the needs of the company.

title: Pama Media & Informatic Co., Ltd
description: Worked well with Strapi, designed UI/UX, implemented the frontend, and monitored the system. Contributed to the development of innovative software solutions that meet the specific needs and requirements of the company.

title: GVSU Applied Computing Institute
description: Developed and implemented a microservice architecture for a web application that allows users to extract themes from reviews. Fine-tuned a new model to improve the accuracy of the theme extraction.
